name: Pixel quest When hope fades demo
name_original: Pixel quest When hope fades demo
description: This short demo is here to show off what might be in the later build, with music from the creator Thales Guimaraes, and game development by me, the game changer. Pixel quest is a 2d platformer that has you using your ability to show platforms that you can't normally see without it. (This, is again, an early build and will be changed drastically afterwards, or over time)
